long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Getthemall Image Downloader - A Powerful & Handy Image Download Tool 🎉

Getthemall Image Downloader is a comprehensive extension that makes downloading images from web pages easy and efficient. With its practical and customizable features, it enhances the image download process significantly. 

Here are the key features:

🎨 New Interface Design: Enjoy a refreshed, modern interface that makes navigating and using the extension smoother and more user-friendly.

🗂 Categorization: It categorizes all the images on the page (images, thumbnails, icons, favicons, etc.), helping you find exactly what you're looking for with ease.

📁 Multiple Format Support: You can download images in JPG, PNG, and WEBP formats, offering flexibility to suit your needs.

💾 Bulk Download: Download all the images on a page at once as a ZIP file, saving you time and simplifying the process.

📏 Sort by Width & Height
: Easily find the images you need by sorting them based on their dimensions.

⚖️ Sort by Size: Sort images by file size to quickly assess the best options to download.

🖱️ Add to Download List with Right Click: Add the desired image to your download list with a right-click, allowing you to download it later, either individually or in bulk.

Download images from the web effortlessly and quickly with Getthemall Image Downloader! 🌐💡
